bio: Another old man with bags full of gifts. Unlike Ol' Saint Trick, all of his presents are good!

soultimate.name: Get-a-Present
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Heals allies at a rate of 15% every 2 seconds for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: All nearby allies slowly recover HP.

skill.effect: Effects of used items are shared with nearby allies.
skill.name: Sharing is Caring

name: Ol' Fortune
